channel.title: Banner Request
channel.description:
Ok, I'm getting a banner done for a friend, and I need some help.
Length & Width- 125x450
Color- Brick red background, with icy blue text.
Text-http://www.tutorial-center.com/tutorials/view/3883/_Ice_Text__Make_your_text_fun_and_icy_with_this_cubic_pixel_ice_effect The text saying Paladin Gods
Thanks to anyone who can help!

item.title: Banner Request
item.dc:creator: @Rangers_Apprentice Rangers_Apprentice
item.description:
@Rangers_Apprentice wrote:

He hasn’t set up the game up yet, or the website for it, otherwise I’d give it to you.

Yes, I know H4x0r… He wanted it though. =\

Read full topic

item.title: Banner Request
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

That’s kind of a fake version of ice…

Read full topic

item.title: Banner Request
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Can I see the website for it? I’d like an idea as to how it will be integrated.

Read full topic

item.title: Banner Request
item.dc:creator: @Rangers_Apprentice Rangers_Apprentice
item.description:
@Rangers_Apprentice wrote:

I didn’t plan on it, but that’s fine. Go for it. David, if I could do it in paint, even a sketch, I wouldn’t ask for help…

Read full topic

item.title: Banner Request
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

If I do it, my name is going on it, in an area where it cannot be removed. It won’t be visible unless you look for it. I have a feeling you will try and claim it as yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Banner Request
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Maybe you could give us a sketch in MSPAINT to give us a better idea of what your friend wants. If that is possible then people will have an easier time helping you out I think =]

Read full topic
